job_tasks.phrase: creating automated processes to develop, test, deploy, and maintain software systems
job_tasks.justification: The phrase directly describes the core activities of MLOps, which involve automating the software development lifecycle, including development, testing, deployment, and maintenance.

job_tasks.phrase: continuous integration and continuous deployment is critical
job_tasks.justification: CI/CD are fundamental principles and practices within MLOps for enabling frequent and reliable software releases.

job_tasks.phrase: design, development, maintenance and support of the IBM Knowledge Catalog services through the full systems development lifecycle
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates responsibility for the entire software development lifecycle, encompassing design, development, and maintenance, which aligns with software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: work in an agile, collaborative environment, adhering to industry best practices for quality, performance, scalability, resiliency and security
job_tasks.justification: Working in an agile environment and adhering to best practices for quality, performance, scalability, resiliency, and security are all aspects of robust software development.

job_tasks.phrase: work in a Kubernetes based micro services environment
job_tasks.justification: Kubernetes is a key technology for deploying and managing microservices, which is a common operational aspect in modern MLOps environments.

job_tasks.phrase: open source DevOps tools (build and deploy automation, monitoring and data gathering for our software delivery pipeline)
job_tasks.justification: The mention of build and deploy automation, monitoring, and data gathering for a software delivery pipeline are all core components of MLOps and DevOps practices.

job_tasks.phrase: contributing to our continuous improvement and continuous delivery
job_tasks.justification: Continuous improvement and continuous delivery are fundamental goals and practices within MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: increasing maturity of DevOps and agile adoption practices
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the operational aspect of improving and adopting DevOps and agile methodologies, which is central to MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: curious to learn as demonstrated by your up-to-date technical knowledge and demonstrated ongoing learning

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes DevOps and the automation of the software development lifecycle, including CI/CD, Kubernetes, and general software development practices. While it mentions 'Data & AI DevOps', it lacks specific details about building, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models or working with LLMs, which are core to a GenAI Engineer role.
